2018.title: Got into Yeditepe University
2018.content: After a year of hardwork and suffering, I've finally got the chance to become a Computer Engineer at Yeditepe University!

2021.title: First Work Experience as a Software Engineer at Amadeus
2021.content: At the 3rd year of university, I got hired as an intern at Amadeus as a Software Engineer.

2021-2023.title: From Intern to Full-Time
2021-2023.content: While continuing my study at Yeditepe, I also kept working at Amadeus. After my internship ended, I became a Full-Time Engineer.

2023.title: Graduation and Starting to Work as a Software Engineer at Betsson
2023.content: Graduated from Yeditepe at 2023. Excited to finally get my degree, but of course a little heart-broken to say goodbye to college.
2023.content2: Also, after my graduation I moved to Malta and started to work as a Software Engineer at Betsson.

2024.title: Leaving Malta and Becoming a Software Engineer at Sqills
2024.content: After a year, I moved out of Malta, got hired by Sqills and started my work there as a Software Engineer.
